start.description: Collaboratively draft an agenda. Let everyone propose and edit agenda items. Free, simple and no registration required.

about.title: About {site-title}
about.short: {site-title} is a service for collaboratively preparing meetings.

poweredBy.title: Powered by
poweredBy.content: The service is powered by {meetling}, a {foss} licensed under the {gpl}.

agendaItemEditor.title: Title
agendaItemEditor.durationDescription: How long does this agenda item take in minutes? An estimate is fine here.

shareNotification.content: To share the meeting, simply give this link to the other participants:
shareNotification.small: Anyone with the link can propose and edit agenda items and change the details of the meeting.
